timePeriods.name: Fajr (Dawn)

azkaar.title: Morning Dhikr
azkaar.translation: I seek forgiveness from Allah, the Most Great

azkaar.title: Alhamdulillah
azkaar.translation: All praise is due to Allah

naflPrayers.name: Duha (Ishraq)
naflPrayers.benefit: Great reward, equivalent to charity for every joint in the body

timePeriods.advice: Recite morning adhkar after Fajr prayer. The time between Fajr and sunrise is blessed. Perform Duha prayer for abundant rewards.

timePeriods.name: Dhuhr (Noon)

azkaar.title: Midday Dhikr
azkaar.translation: There is no deity except Allah

azkaar.title: Salawat
azkaar.translation: O Allah, send blessings upon Muhammad

timePeriods.advice: Perform the Sunnah prayers before and after Dhuhr. This is a good time for dhikr and seeking forgiveness. Recite Salawat upon the Prophet (peace be upon him).

timePeriods.name: Asr (Afternoon)

azkaar.title: Afternoon Dhikr
azkaar.translation: Glory be to Allah and praise be to Him

azkaar.title: La Hawla
azkaar.text: لَا حَوْلَ وَلَا قُوَّةَ إِلَّا بِاللَّهِ
azkaar.translation: There is no power or strength except with Allah

timePeriods.advice: Recite Ayat al-Kursi after Asr prayer for protection. This is a blessed time for dhikr. Avoid sleeping during this time as it may cause laziness.

timePeriods.name: Maghrib (Sunset)

azkaar.title: Evening Dhikr
azkaar.text: اللَّهُمَّ أَنْتَ رَبِّي لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ
azkaar.translation: O Allah, You are my Lord, there is no deity except You

azkaar.title: Alhamdulillah
azkaar.translation: All praise is due to Allah

naflPrayers.name: Awwabeen
naflPrayers.benefit: Great reward, prayers of the repentant

timePeriods.advice: Recite evening adhkar after Maghrib prayer. The time between Maghrib and Isha is blessed. Perform Awwabeen prayer for great rewards.

timePeriods.name: Isha (Night)

azkaar.title: Night Dhikr
azkaar.translation: O Allah, by You we enter the evening and by You we enter the morning

azkaar.title: Last 3 Surahs
azkaar.translation: The last three chapters of the Quran

azkaar.title: Tasbih
azkaar.text: سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ وَالْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ وَلَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَاللَّهُ أَكْبَرُ
azkaar.translation: Glory be to Allah, all praise is due to Allah, there is no deity except Allah, and Allah is the Greatest

naflPrayers.name: Witr
naflPrayers.benefit: Highly recommended, the Prophet never missed it

naflPrayers.name: Tahajjud
naflPrayers.benefit: Best time for night prayer, great spiritual benefit

timePeriods.advice: Recite the last three Surahs and Ayat al-Kursi before sleeping for protection. Perform Witr prayer as it was never missed by the Prophet. Tahajjud in the last third of the night is highly meritorious.
